name: Beasts Of The Night Mist
description:
Beasts Of The Night Mist

Help a lonely lost Archer to survive in the mystical forest.
Fight monsters, earn money, upgrade your Archer,
mercilessly kill raccoons and survive the night.

MADE BY:

  • Bogdan Kurilo - Code, Game Design, Art
  • Denis Popov - Music & SFX
  • Yan Shinkevich - English localization

Great thanks to FreeSound.org
